el:protected.el:luamain:
ti[" "] = {"fl_bluegreen"} ti["~"] = {"fl_water"} ti["#"] = {"st_greenbrown"} ti["X"] = {"st_grate", flavor="cross"} ti["B"] = {"st_passage", flavor="frame", color=BLACK} ti["W"] = {"st_passage", flavor="frame", color=WHITE} ti["^"] = {"st_oneway", orientation=NORTH} ti[">"] = {"st_oneway", orientation=EAST} ti["V"] = {"st_oneway", orientation=SOUTH} ti["<"] = {"st_oneway", orientation=WEST} ti["="] = {"st_door", flavor="d", faces="ns", name="door"} ti["S"] = {"st_switch", target="door"} ti["."] = {"it_seed"} ti["x"] = ti["X"] .. ti["."] ti["O"] = {"st_oxyd"} ti["A"] = {"#ac_marble_white"} ti["a"] = cond(wo["CreatingPreview"], ti["#"] .. {"#ac_marble_black"}, ti["#"]) ti["@"] = cond(wo["CreatingPreview"], ti[" "], {"#ac_marble_black"})
wo(ti, " ", { "####################", "#XXXXXXXxXXXXXX> #", "#XXXxXXXXXxXXXX> A #", "#xXXXXXXXXXXXXX> #", "#XXXXXXXXXXXXXX#^^^#", "#XXXXXxXXXXXXXXXxXX#", "#XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX#", "#XXXXXXXXXXxXXXXXXX#", "#XXXXXXxXXXXXXX#^^^#", "#XXxXXXXXXXXXXX< #", "#XXXXXXXXxXXXXX< @ #", "#XXXXXXXXXXXXXX< #", "#x##################", "a X< BB B < #O#", "# #X X<< < # #B#", "#^B##^###^BBB^B^BB #", "#^BB X< > B > #", "# < #V#V##^BB^BB^#", "#X #X > < X# # B #", "#VBBBV#^#BBBVB^#VB^#", "# > < < > < # # < #", "# #^B^#^BV#B^B # #W#", "# B # # BXX< # #=#", "# > XXBXBX< B < #O#", "####### ############", "# #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# WWWWW #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# WBBBW #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# WBSBW #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# WBBBW #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# WWWWW #~~~~~~~~~~~", "# #~~~~~~~~~~~", "#########~~~~~~~~~~~", "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~"})
